data.actual_result: Cannot open until you try to mention them
data.expected_result: Can open user settings at the bottom
data.short_description: Can't open user settings when user doesn't appear in user list
data.steps_to_repro: - Force close Discord - Find a user that doesn't appear when you type @username - Try to hold their avatar (nothing pops up at bottom) - Tap on their avatar until the list of users appear - It works after their name pops up (Takes longer than normal which is instant)
